handlers
utils

Methods

(static) addExtension(hook, func) → {Object}

Adds an extension function to be executed when the specified hook is "fired." The extension function is called for each element and is passed any relevant arguments for the hook.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
hook string the name of the hook for which the extension will be registered
func function the function to be executed when the hook is "fired"
Source:
  • taboverride.js, line 657
Returns:
the tabOverride object

Object

(static) autoIndent(enableopt) → {boolean|Object}

Gets or sets the auto indent setting. True if each line should be automatically indented (default = true).
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
enable boolean <optional>
 whether auto indent should be enabled

whether auto indent is enabled or the tabOverride object

(static) set(elems, enableopt) → {Object}

Enables or disables Tab Override for the specified textarea element(s). Hooks: set - passed the current element and a boolean indicating whether Tab Override was enabled or disabled.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
elems Element | Array.<Element> the textarea element(s) for which to enable or disable Tab Override
enable boolean <optional>
 true whether Tab Override should be enabled for the element(s)

(static) tabKey(keyCode, modifierKeyNamesopt) → {string|Object}

Gets or sets the tab key combination.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
keyCode number the key code of the key to use for tab
modifierKeyNames Array.<string> <optional>
 the modifier key names - valid names are 'alt', 'ctrl', 'meta', and 'shift'

the current tab key combination or the tabOverride object

string | Object

(static) tabSize(sizeopt) → {number|Object}

Gets or sets the tab size for all elements that have Tab Override enabled. 0 represents the tab character.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
size number <optional>
 the tab size
